title: Atomic Habits
author: James Clear
description: A practical guide on how to build good habits, break bad ones, and master tiny behaviors that lead to remarkable results.

title: The Pragmatic Programmer
author: Andrew Hunt, David Thomas
description: Classic programming book that covers essential software development practices, from coding techniques to career advice.

title: Clean Code
author: Robert C. Martin
description: A handbook of agile software craftsmanship teaching how to write cleaner, more maintainable code.

title: Deep Work
author: Cal Newport
description: Rules for focused success in a distracted world. Explains how to cultivate concentration and deep focus.

title: Introduction to Algorithms
author: Thomas H. Cormen
description: Comprehensive guide to modern algorithms with detailed explanations and pseudocode.

title: You Don’t Know JS Yet
author: Kyle Simpson
description: In-depth series on core mechanisms of JavaScript programming language.

title: The Psychology of Money
author: Morgan Housel
description: Timeless lessons on wealth, greed, and happiness with powerful storytelling.

title: Artificial Intelligence: A Modern Approach
author: Stuart Russell, Peter Norvig
description: Definitive guide to AI concepts, methods, and applications.

author: Yuval Noah Harari

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: A memoir about growing up in a strict survivalist family and the struggle for education.
